Package org.netbeans.api.templates

Registration of templates and creation of new files from them.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CreateFromTemplateAttributes
    This is an interface for smart templating.
    CreateFromTemplateDecorator
    Decorator for templating.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateDescriptor
    Describes file creation request.
    CreateFromTemplateHandler
    This is an interface for smart templating that allows any module to intercept calls to FileBuilder.build() and handle them themselves.
    FileBuilder
    Fluent interface for file creation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileBuilder.Mode
    Determines the default procedure for copying the template in FileBuilder.createFromTemplate(org.openide.filesystems.FileObject, org.openide.filesystems.FileObject, java.lang.String, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?>, org.netbeans.api.templates.FileBuilder.Mode).
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    TemplateRegistration
    Registers a template the user can select.
    TemplateRegistrations
    May be used to register multiple plain-file TemplateRegistrations.

Package org.netbeans.api.templates Description

Registration of templates and creation of new files from them.
